Info.description:
This Simulink Project contains Simulink I/O integration layer with control system and ground station model for RRTV. This is intended to be used with PX4 Autopilot.
Github sources: https://github.com/YevheniiKovryzhenko/RRTV_TiltWing.git https://github.com/YevheniiKovryzhenko/PX4_SIMULINK_IO_Framework.git
